ability.name: Blaze
ability.description: Deal +1 damage with [Fire] moves at half [HP] or less.

ability.name: Flash Fire
ability.description: Unless Cyndaquil is the only remaining Pokémon on your team, gain +1 [Shield] if hit by a [Fire] move instead of taking damage or its effects.

ability.name: Intimidate
ability.description: On each round, the first [Contact] move by an enemy within Range 2 of Growlithe deals -1 damage (min. 1 dmg).

ability.name: Torrent
ability.description: At the beginning of your turn, instead of drawing a card, you may search for a [Water] Action card (excluding Ultimates), reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck afterwards. At half [HP] or less, add the number of [Shield] on Squirtle to damage.

ability.name: Sheer Force
ability.description: If a Feraligatr card is discarded as an Action, an adjacent target can be pushed by up to 2 spaces. If the target is an enemy, the opponent must also discard a card.

ability.name: Shell Armor
ability.description: [Shield] cannot be ignored by incoming attacks. If hit by a Slicing move, deal 1 damage back to the attacker.

ability.name: Speed Boost
ability.description: At the end of your turn, Blaziken gains 1 [Move].

ability.name: Sniper
ability.description: Ignore [Shield] when attacking from range 3 or greater. At the end of your turn, if Inteleon did not move or perform an action, it becomes Guarded.

ability.name: Grassy Surge
ability.description: Spaces within Range 2 of Rillaboom are Grassy Terrain. At the end of your turn, all [Walk] Pokemon on Grassy Terrain heal 1 HP.

ability.name: Grass Pelt
ability.description: Starts with 1 Shield. At the beginning of your turn, if Skiddo is on Grassy Terrain, gain +1 Shield.

ability.name: Prankster
ability.description: Draw a card each time Whimsicott makes a [Status] Action.

ability.name: Overgrow
ability.description: At the beginning of your turn, instead of drawing a card, you may search for a [Grass] Action card (excluding Ultimates), reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck afterwards. At half [HP] or less, Bulbasaur's moves have +1 range.

ability.name: Static
ability.description: On each turn, the first time Pikachu is hit by a [Contact] move, the attacker is Paralyzed and Pikachu gains 1 Move.

ability.name: Static
ability.description: Every time Mareep uses an [Electric] [Status] move, Mareep gains 1 [Shield]. On each turn, the first time Mareep is hit by a [Contact] move, the attacker is Paralyzed.

ability.name: Solar Power
ability.description: If the weather is Sunny, this ability has the following effects: At the beginning of your turn, you may search your deck for a [Electric] card (excluding Ultimates), reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck afterwards. Heliolisk's [Electric] moves can deal +1 damage in exchange for 1 HP.

ability.name: Motor Drive
ability.description: Unless Zebstrika is the only remaining Pokémon on your team, gain +1 [Move] if hit by an [Electric] move instead of taking damage/effects.

ability.name: Run Away
ability.description: At the end of every turn, if Furret is adjacent to an enemy, it can move up to 2 spaces.

ability.name: Run Away
ability.description: At the end of every turn, if Eevee is adjacent to an enemy, it can move up to 2 spaces.

ability.name: Technician
ability.description: If a card is discarded as an Action, Meowth gains +1 [Move].

ability.name: Gulp Missile
ability.description: When Cramorant uses Dive or Surf, gain 1 [Shield]. If Cramorant is damaged, deal 1 damage back to the attacker. If the attacker reduces Cramorant's [HP], they are also paralyzed. This ability cannot be copied, changed, or removed.

ability.name: Big Pecks
ability.description: Negates card effects that remove [Shield] from Ducklett, or effects that cause Ducklett to take extra incoming damage. Starts with 1 Shield.

ability.name: Hydration
ability.description: At the beginning of each turn, if it is Raining, Wingull is cured of Status conditions.

ability.name: Drizzle
ability.description: At the beginning of your turn, you may lose a card from your hand to make the weather Raining. Then, each player may discard 3 cards from the top of their deck. If any cards discarded this way are [Water] cards. they are added to their hand.

ability.name: Drought
ability.description: At the beginning of your turn, you may lose a card from your hand to make the weather Sunny. Then, each player may discard 3 cards from the top of their deck. If any cards discarded this way are [Fire] or [Grass] cards. they are added to their hand.

ability.name: Magician
ability.description: Once during your turn, you may put a card from your hand to the bottom of your deck and draw a card.
